content:
System.ComponentModel.Composition.ReflectionModel Namespace

Definition

The System.ComponentModel.Composition.ReflectionModel namespace provides Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) types for developers who use a reflection-based programming model.

In this Article

Classes

ReflectionModelServices

Provides extension methods to create and retrieve reflection-based parts.

Structs

LazyMemberInfo

Represents a MemberInfo object that does not load assemblies or create objects until requested.
